name: Kinematic Body - Custom Character Controller for Unity 3D
name_original: Kinematic Body - Custom Character Controller for Unity 3D
description:
My solution to Custom Character Controllers in Unity 3D using a Kinematic Rigidbody. You can get the source files at: https://github.com/marmitoTH/Unity-Kinematic-Body

Controls: arrow keys to move, space to jump.
